Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Block

  • public class Block
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class for showing and calculate blocks
    bMatrix parameter is consisted of BlockCube Array
    0 1 2 3
    1
    2
    3

    each cube is BlockCube class
    data of each block is in BlockConstants
    Author:
    DongYeop Lee
    See Also:
    BlockCube, BlockConstants, Serialized Form
